data.name: CheckErrorCouldNotConnect
data.value: The licence server could not be contacted. Either the server does not have an active Internet connection, or a firewall is blocking communication. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorLocked
data.value: Your licence has been disabled by RainWorx. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorMachineChanged
data.value: The machine has changed since the licence was registered. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorNoClientsRemaining
data.value: There were no unused clients remaining for the licence. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorNoSuchLicence
data.value: The licence does not exist on the server. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorNotTSLicence
data.value: The environment is Terminal Services or Citrix, but the licence is not for use under Citrix. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorNotVirtualLicence
data.value: The environment is VMWare or MS Virtual PC, but the licence is not for use under virtualisation. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorNotYetRegistered
data.value: GearShift is not yet registered on this machine. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorNoWmi
data.value: The WMI service is not available on this machine. WMI is required for licensing. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorProxyAuthenticationRequired
data.value: You must specify WebProxyCredentials. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorTampered
data.value: It appears that either the licence, licence response, or cache has been tampered with. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorUnspecified
data.value: An unspecified licensing error occurred. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorWrongProduct
data.value: The licence is for a different product. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckErrorWrongVersion
data.value: The version of the application exceeds the maximum version of the licence. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorCouldNotConnect
data.value: The licence server could not be contacted. Either the server does not have an active Internet connection, or a firewall is blocking communication. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorCouldNotReadLicence
data.value: To activate GearShift you must place your licence file in the location specified in the web.config file.

data.name: RegisterErrorLicenceFilenameNullOrEmpty
data.value: An empty or null licence filename was passed. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorLocked
data.value: Your licence has been disabled by RainWorx. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorNoClientsRemaining
data.value: There were no unused clients remaining for the licence. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorNoSuchLicence
data.value: The licence does not exist on the server. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorNotTSLicence
data.value: The environment is Terminal Services or Citrix, but the licence is not for use under Citrix. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorNotVirtualLicence
data.value: The environment is VMWare or MS Virtual PC, but the licence is not for use under virtualisation. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorNoWmi
data.value: The WMI service is not available on this machine. WMI is required for licensing. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorProxyAuthenticationRequired
data.value: You must specify WebProxyCredentials. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorTampered
data.value: It appears that either the licence, licence response, or cache has been tampered with. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorUnspecified
data.value: An unspecified licensing error occurred. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorUnsupportedOS
data.value: Windows 95, 98 and 98 SE are not supported. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorWrongProduct
data.value: The version of the application exceeds the maximum version of the licence. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterErrorWrongVersion
data.value: The version of the application exceeds the maximum version of the licence. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: Unregistered
data.value: You have successfully deactivated GearShift on this machine. If you do not want it to automatically re-activate, please move your licence file now.

data.name: CheckFeatureDemoExpired
data.value: Your Demo licence of GearShift is expired. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckFeatureNone
data.value: You have a valid licence, but it does not grant you the right to use GearShift. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: CheckFeaturePeriodicExpired
data.value: Your Periodic license of GearShift is expired. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterFeatureDemoExpired
data.value: Your Demo licence of GearShift is expired. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterFeatureNone
data.value: You have a valid licence, but it does not grant you the right to use GearShift. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.

data.name: RegisterFeaturePeriodicExpired
data.value: Your Periodic license of GearShift is expired. Please contact RainWorx support to resolve the issue.
